  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_78687</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_78687</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="fr">Refroidissement, théorie affaiblie de la formation de la  terre</string>
            <string language="en">Cooling, shrinking theory of Earth formation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Abkühlen, schrumpfende Theorie der Masse 
Anordnung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Refrigerando, teoria shrinking da formação da 
terra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Raffreddandosi, teoria shrinking di formazione 
della terra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ψύξη, στενεύοντας θεωρία του γήινου σχηματισμού</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Refrescándose, teoría que encoge de la 
formación de la tierra</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Cette illustration montre des étapes sur la formation de la terre selon des premiers scientifiques.  Les processus impliqués pour chaque étape sont indiqués.</string>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows stages on how the Earth was formed according to early scientists. The processes involved for each stage are indicated.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">le refroidissement</string>
            <string language="en">cooling</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">noyau</string>
            <string language="en">core</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">ride de la croûte</string>
            <string language="en">crust wrinkles</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">met à la terre</string>
            <string language="en">Earth</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">roche en fusion</string>
            <string language="en">hot molten rock</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">croûte pleine</string>
            <string language="en">solid crust</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt Stadien auf, wie die Masse 
nach Ansicht der frühen Wissenschaftler gebildet wurde. Die 
Prozesse, die für jedes Stadium mit einbezogen werden, werden 
angezeigt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra estágios em como a 
terra foi dada forma de acordo com cientistas adiantados. Os 
processos envolvidos para cada estágio são indicados.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra le fasi su come la 
terra è stata formata secondo gli scienziati in anticipo. I 
processi addetti per ogni fase sono indicati.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει στάδια στον τρόπο με τον 
οποίο η γη διαμορφώθηκε σύμφωνα με τους πρώτους επιστήμονες. 
Οι διαδικασίες που περιλαμβάνονται για κάθε στάδιο είναι 
υποδειγμένες.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra etapas en cómo la 
tierra fue formada según científicos tempranos. Los procesos 
implicados para cada etapa se indican.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Abkühlen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kern</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Krusteknicken</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Masse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">heißer flüssiger Felsen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">feste Kruste</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">refrigerar</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">núcleo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">enrugamentos da crosta</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Terra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">rocha derretida quente</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">crosta contínua</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">raffreddamento</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">nucleo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">grinze della crosta</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Terra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">roccia fusa calda</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">crosta solida</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ψύξη</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">πυρήνας</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ρυτίδες κρουστών</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γη</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">καυτός λειωμένος βράχος</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">στερεά κρούστα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">el refrescarse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">base</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">arrugas de la corteza</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Tierra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">roca fundida caliente</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">corteza sólida</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
